title: Player giving up
body:
The largest problem in league is people giving up because they aren't  winning. i know there's not much that can be done about it but i wanted to post this anyway.

People need to report this more often and reports need to be taken more seriously. it may not be afk but its just as bad.

I don't think i report excessively but i definitely think when i'm reporting that its for a justified reason, not just because i'm annoyed. i understand having a bad game but half the time they just give up/afk/intentionally feed and make the game worse for every1 because they want every1 else to surrender just because they (1 person) want to quit.

Also i would like the notifications to come back if some1 has been disciplined due to my reports. if u still get notified, i haven't been notified in months, probably closer to years, and if that's the case, is no1 seriously getting disciplined for the things there doing in my games?

replies.body: Kids will generally give up yeah cos they have had everything spoon fed to them and "everyone's a winner" mentality taught to them. So when they are losing they don't know what to do.

I recently read somewhere that you only get the notification if it was YOUR report that triggered the punishment. If 4 different people reported someone for afking, only the report that triggered it would get the notification. I think that's a bit shit.

Frankly it is pretty shit. The notification is notoriously unreliable and also rather limited. Not getting a notification doesn't mean noone was punished, nor does it mean your report was meaningless. Getting a notification does always mean that someone was punished, so it's a nice little bonus, but it shouldn't be counted on by any stretch.
Don't waste your fucking time reporting any more.    RIOT DOESN'T GIVE A SHIT..   they don't even read them.   Just save your energy.

What I find funny about bronze in general is that after they get killed in first blood they automatically rage and afk straight after. But that happens regardless in any lane or situation. I hate to see what Iron will be like tbh
